      • getEntities

        public static void getEntities(Activity context,
               int start,
               int end,
               EntityUtils.SortOrder sortOrder,
               EntityListListener listener)
        Retrieves all entities sorted by creation date.
        Parameters:
        context - The current context.
        start - The start index for pagination (0 based).
        end - The end index for pagination (0 based).
        sortOrder - The sorting to be used (default is CREATION_DATE)
        listener - A listener to handle the result.

      • getEntities

        public static void getEntities(Activity context,
               EntityUtils.SortOrder sortOrder,
               EntityListListener listener,
               String... keys)
        Retrieves the entities designated by the given keys.
        Parameters:
        context - The current context.
        listener - A listener to handle the result.
        sortOrder - The sorting to be used (default is CREATION_DATE)
        keys - One or more entity keys.
